scripts.test: rimraf ./.nyc_output ./coverage && concurrently "yarn test:core" "yarn test:orm-query" "yarn test:orm-connector" "yarn test:socket"
scripts.build: yarn build:core && concurrently "yarn build:orm-query" "yarn build:orm-connector" "yarn build:socket-common" && concurrently "yarn build:socket-server" "yarn build:socket-client"
scripts.test-only:core: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/core/tsconfig.json nyc --include packages/core/src/** --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/core/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:core: rimraf coverage/core .nyc_output/core && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/core/tsconfig.json nyc --report-dir coverage/core --temp-directory .nyc_output/core --include packages/core/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/core/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-query: rimraf coverage/orm-query .nyc_output/orm-query && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-query/tsconfig.json nyc --report-dir coverage/orm-query --temp-directory .nyc_output/orm-query --include packages/orm-query/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-query/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-connector: rimraf coverage/orm-connector .nyc_output/orm-connector && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-connector/tsconfig.json nyc --report-dir coverage/orm-connector --temp-directory .nyc_output/orm-connector --include packages/orm-connector/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-connector/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:socket: rimraf coverage/socket .nyc_output/socket && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/socket/tsconfig.json nyc --report-dir coverage/socket --temp-directory .nyc_output/socket --include packages/socket-client/src/** --include packages/socket-server/src/** --include packages/socket-common/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/socket/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.build:core: tslint -c packages/core/tslint.json -p packages/core/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/core/dist && tsc --project packages/core/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-query: tslint -c packages/orm-query/tslint.json -p packages/orm-query/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-query/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-query/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-connector: tslint -c packages/orm-connector/tslint.json -p packages/orm-connector/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-connector/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-connector/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-common: tslint -c packages/socket-common/tslint.json -p packages/socket-common/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-common/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-common/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-server: tslint -c packages/socket-server/tslint.json -p packages/socket-server/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-server/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-server/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-client: tslint -c packages/socket-client/tslint.json -p packages/socket-client/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-client/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-client/tsconfig-build.json
